item.description:
Belly Dancing Class with Sabrina Tarulli
Good for any body, any age!
Fridays,  7:30-9:00 p.m. 
$24 walk-in, or bundle classes for a month
at $20 a class pre-paid.  
Class includes
Rhythmic limbering and movement rehearsal
Movement vocabulary break-down
Belly dance isolations and techniques
Wear comfortable dance exercise clothing and plan to dance in bare feet, or soft dance shoes. Fun wear includes skirts or harem pants, cropped half tops and tank tops or decorated bra tops, fringed or coined belts. Bear in mind you won't want to feel hindered while dancing.  RSVP to Meetup or register with Judy:  781-639-2136
Belly Dancer Sabrina is a prominent professional Belly Dancer in the New England area, known for her ability to consistently thrill American and Middle Eastern Audiences with her amazing performances. web site: http://www.bellydance... 
 For more info on other programs go to www.AHigherBalance.com
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the doorway at the center of the building next to H&R block. Take the elevator or stairs up one flight, go down the hall to the right to suite 6B.
item.why: Belly dancing is fun and good for any body, any age. Music is awesome, dance moves are simple, teacher is amazing. This class is now a walk-in for $24 or a bundle by the month by pre-paying $20/class..
item.name: Belly Dancing!
